org.lemurproject.ireval

Class SetRetrievalEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lemurproject.ireval.SetRetrievalEvaluator

  • public class SetRetrievalEvaluator
extends Object
    Computes summary statistics over a set of queries.
    Author:
    Trevor Strohman, Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • evaluateAll

        public Map<String,Double> evaluateAll(String metric)
                               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Get a Map containing a particular metric value for each query. For instance, if metric == "averagePrecision", this returns a map where the keys are query identifiers and the values are the average precision metric evaluated for each query.
        Parameters:
        metric - the metric name.
        Returns:
        A Map containing a particular metric value for each query.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • numberRetrieved

        public int numberRetrieved()
        Returns:
        The number of documents retrieved for all queries.

      • numberRelevant

        public int numberRelevant()
        Returns:
        The total number of relevant documents to any of the queries.

      • numberRelevantRetrieved

        public int numberRelevantRetrieved()
        Returns:
        The total number of relevant documents retrieved for any of the queries.
